isis.stitle: CAB: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - WINDSHIELD AND SEAL (AFTER JULY 1993)

svcsubproc.title: Remove
svcsubproc.para: This windshield ( Figure 6) is a one-piece, flat, glass type with a one-piece molded weather seal (with no insert).

calloutgroup.callout1: 4. DUM DUM SEALER (VIEW IN CIRCLE B)
7. ARROWS INDICATE DIRECTION OF PULL ON INSTALLATION

note.para: When replacing the earlier design windshield, replace with the re-designed windshield and weather seal. Note the difference between the two windshields is the re-designed windshield is slightly larger.

warning.para: When removing or installing windshield glass, wear gloves.

step1.para: Remove washer hose and wiper arm (Items 1 and 2, Figure 3) from top of cowl. Refer to WIPER ARM, Remove.
Remove sun visor and sun visor support clip (this will help on installation). Refer to SUN VISOR AND CLIP, Remove.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 6for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Starting at the inside bottom edge of the windshield, work up the pillar post (Item 3) toward the top. Using a glass tool fiber blade or a thin, flat, dull (round edge) screwdriver, lift weather seal (Item 2) lip off windshield cab edge, at the same time pushing outward on the windshield area being worked on.
With an assistant on the outside of the cab helping to remove windshield, pry seal off cab.
Remove windshield with weather seal (Item 2) attached from cab.

svcsubproc.title: Install

warning.para: When removing or installing windshield glass, wear gloves.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 6for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Clean windshield body flange (Item 8) area, making sure it is free of dirt, wax, and old sealer compound.
Apply a ball of dum-dum sealer (Item 4) 1/4 inch diameter where cab roof and pillar post (Items 9 and 3) join.
Install weather seal (Item 2) onto windshield. Use a water and soap solution to soap the weather seal groove that fits onto the windshield body flange (Item 8); also soap the windshield body flange.

Use a 1/8 inch nylon rope (Item 5) that is longer than the circumference of the windshield by approximately one foot or more. Using a piece of steel brake line or copper tubing six inches long with an inside diameter that is small but large enough to feed the 1/8 inch nylon rope through, feed rope through tube.

Starting at either bottom edge corner (Item 6), place the tube with the nylon rope (Item 5) into flange groove of weather seal (Item 2). Holding rope in place, work tube with rope completely around weather seal body flange groove.

With an assistant, place windshield into position on cab. With the assistant holding the windshield in place from the outside, push the windshield inward at the bottom corner area where installation is being started [at the corner where the rope end is (Item 6)].

From the inside of the cab, use a weather seal tool (fiber/nylon blade) or dull screwdriver with rounded edges to work weather seal lip over body flange (Item 8). Once weather seal is started, use the rope (Item 5) to position seal lip over the body flange.
When pulling on the nylon installation rope, pull at a 90-degree angle from the weather seal. Have rope against the glass when pulling.

note.para: Have the assistant push the glass in the opposite direction from which you are pulling the guide rope. Example: If you are pulling down on the rope, the assistant should be pushing up on the windshield in the same area. This action will help keep the windshield from moving (Item 7).

step1.para: After installation of the windshield, clean off excess soap and dum-dum sealer (Item 4) from glass, weather seal (Item 2) and cab.
Install wiper arm (Item 2, Figure 3) on top of cowl. Install washer hose (Item 1, Figure 3) onto wiper arm. Refer to WIPER ARM, Install.
Install sun visor(s) and sun visor support clip. Refer to SUN VISOR AND CLIP, Install.
